actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Safety Officers' Benefits Act of 1976 to eliminate the requirement that parents of deceased public safety officers be financially dependent on such officers in order to qualify for death benefits.

summary.text: Amends the Public Safety Officers' Benefits Act of 1976 to eliminate the requirement that parents of deceased public safety officers be financially dependent on such officers in order to qualify for death benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Safety Officers' Benefits Act of 1976 to eliminate the requirement that parents of deceased public safety officers be financially dependent on such officers in order to qualify for death benefits.
